definition: Consciousness of who will read the text and adjustment of content, style, and approach accordingly

positive_examples: Audience awareness shapes everything from vocabulary level to examples chosen.
For expert audiences, skip background; for novices, build foundations first.
Anticipating reader objections shows audience awareness.
The writer adjusts technical detail based on what the audience already knows.
negative_examples: The writing is intended for someone.
training_hints.disambiguation: Active adaptation to audience needs, not just having an audience
